thread.title: Beighton Cup hockey: Bhubaneswar Hostel drub Central Secretariat 7-0
thread.title_full: Beighton Cup hockey: Bhubaneswar Hostel drub Central Secretariat 7-0

author: NewsWire
title: Beighton Cup hockey: Bhubaneswar Hostel drub Central Secretariat 7-0
text: Kolkata, Oct 3 (IANS) Bhubaneswar Hostel registered a thumping 7-0 win over Central Secretariat while RCF Kapurthala outsmarted Assam Regiment 4-2 in the quarter final league matches of the 120th All India Beighton Cup Hockey tournament here on Saturday. In another game, Central Railway squeezed past East Coach Railway 2-1. For Bhubaneswar, Nitin Mukesh Tigga and Prasant Tirkey struck two goals each, while Kunjan Topno, Teophil Kujur and Prakash Barla pitched in with one apiece. Kapurthala were well served by Sanjay Bir with three strikes, and Simrandeep found the target on one occasion. M. Sashi Kumar Singh and T.H. Banty Singh were the scorers for Assam Regiment . In a well-fought encounter between two railway teams, Yuvraj Valmiki and Narad Bahadur enlisted their names as Central Railway scorers. Vinit Kujur was the lone goal getter for East Coast Railway .
